bibl.title: The Periplus of the Erythraean Sea: An Account of Roman Egypt's Trade with India (Part I).
bibl.note: The political and commercial conditions which governed trading between Egypt and the East. A second article will deal with the topography of the Periplus.
Astbury Arthur K., The Periplus of the Erythraean Sea: An Account of Roman Egypt's Trade with India (Part I).
The Egyptian Bulletin 15 (December 1985) pp. 14-19, 5 figg. et 1 carte.
